description: The Climate Change Bill 2020 would enshrine in law the goal of net zero carbon emissions by 2050.
title: MHKs criticise 'wishy washy' Isle of Man climate change bill
title_page: MHKs criticise 'wishy washy' Isle of Man climate change bill - BBC News
maintext: She said: "The more I read and re-read the bill, the more concerned I was that this is green-washing - the government apparently taking action to combat climate change but in reality nothing meaningful will be implemented or might be implemented as part of this bill."
